scripts.server: bun run protocol:build && bun run server:only
scripts.client: bun run protocol:build && bun run client:only
scripts.web: bun run protocol:build && bun run web:only
scripts.ios: bun run protocol:build && bun run ios:only
scripts.android: bun run protocol:build && bun run android:only
scripts.agent-local: bun run protocol:build && bun run agent-local:only
scripts.worker: bun run protocol:build && bun run worker:only
scripts.serial-pusher: bun run protocol:build && bun run serial-pusher:only
scripts.agent-remote: bun run protocol:build && bun run agent-remote:only
scripts.dev: bun run protocol:build && concurrently -n server,client -c blue,green "bun run server:only" "bun run client:only"
scripts.dev:full: bun run protocol:build && concurrently -n server,agent-local,agent-remote,worker,pusher,client -c blue,magenta,red,yellow,cyan,green "bun run server:only" "bun run agent-local:only" "bun run agent-remote:only" "bun run worker:only" "bun run serial-pusher:only:dev" "bun run client:only:offline"
